Key Match Events: Roston Chase's unbeaten 42 off 27 balls led West Indies to a five-wicket win with an over to spare over Papua New Guinea
Post-Match Reflections: Roston Chase was named 'Man of the Match' for his crucial contribution
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the opening Group C encounter of the T20 World Cup 2024
Others: Assad Vala led the way with the ball for Papua New Guinea, taking two for 28 from four overs of spin
